MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich affecting properties in Crowton and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 4:05AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to re-erect the ground overhead cables and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6AM on 16 November 2020.
